titles.title: PACCARB Act
PACCARB Act
Presidential Advisory Council on Combating Antibiotic-Resistant Bacteria Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to continue the Presidential Advisory Council on Combating Antibiotic-Resistant Bacteria, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Presidential Advisory Council on Combating Antibiotic-Resistant Bacteria Act or the PACCARB Act
This bill provides statutory authority for the Presidential Advisory Council on Combating Antibiotic-Resistant Bacteria. It also modifies the activities of the Antimicrobial Resistance Task Force, including by requiring the task force to seek input from the council.
